title: Refining your search
body: ## Refining your search If you're not getting the results you want from the search page, whether too few or two many, there are a number of parameters you can change to refine your search and improve the results. Tap the funnel icon in the top right corner of the page and it will reveal a form with various parameters. ![Analysis search form](/gin-data/images/1527772574406-analysis-form.png)
